Articles.Content:
Hi I have been having issues with KSP in that whatever version I install and whether or not I install mods on it the game has no sound. I have checked sound mixer and the game is not muted (everything else is producing audio just fine) and the audio is on in game just for some reason the game is not outputting any audio.

I have repeatedly uninstalled and reinstalled KSP but the problem persists

Any help in solving this would be greatly appreciated. Thanks

Edited June 24, 2019 by Byte_Bot
